error.internet: Oops, an error occured Or You are not Online

landingPage.welcome_message: MAKE YOUR TRANSPORT EASIER WITH PHANTOM
landingPage.pTag2: Track how far is your bus and save you Time.

notFound.p: But dont worry, you can find plenty of other things on our homepage.

simulator.p: In this section you will simulate the bus. You will simulate with controls such as start, stop, speed up and down bus. You can also add and remove passengers. Enjoy!
